subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Experiment with Being Silly
author: Lisby
full_text:
Me, too, Nellie. Almost nothing from them at all. I was thinking I  
had been abandoned!

Ann

On Feb 20, 2008, at 7:11 PM, rednellie wrote:

> I've just gone through a streak of over a week with barely getting any
> responses through my hack. Tonight I was in a silly mood, though, and
> tried doing a little magic act with Oscar to have him read my mind. I
> don't know if it was from being goofy or because of the full moon,  
> but I
> got 3 responses from him in one little 2 minute recording. I'm  
> assuming
> it's the former, since his responses were a little on the silly  
> side, too.
>  <RS469 2-20-08 Hello Oscar.mp3><RS469 2-20-08 Have I  
> ever told you.mp3><RS469 2-20-08 Impress your parents.mp3>


Me, oo, Nellie. Almos no hing om hem a all. I was hinking I had been abandoned!AnnOn Feb 20, 2008, a 7:11 PM, ednellie w o e: I' e jus gone h ough a s eak o o e a week wi h ba ely ge ing any esponses h ough my hack. Tonigh I was in a silly mood, hough, and ied doing a li le magic ac wi h Osca o ha e him ead my mind. I don' know i i was om being goo y o because o he ull moon, bu I go 3 esponses om him in one li le 2 minu e eco ding. I'm assuming i 's he o me , since his esponses we e a li le on he silly side, oo.
